## Work with shp2pgsql

```shell
shp2pgsql -I -s 900913 D:/Daten/Daten/GeoDaten/bremen-140226.shp/points.shp public.geospatial-data | psql -p 5432 -d RLPgis
```
## Work with osmosis

- [Learn osmosis](http://learnosm.org/en/osm-data/osmosis/)

- Work with [osmosis](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/User:Ajoessen/Osmosis)

- [detailed usage osmosis](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Osmosis/Detailed_Usage_0.43)


```shell
osmosis --rbf sample_osmosis.osm.pbf --write-xml sample.osm
```

```shell
osmosis --rbf rheinland-pfalz-latest.osm.pbf --write-xml RLP.osm
```

More examples: 

- Get data from [Geofabrik](http://download.geofabrik.de/europe/germany.html)

```shell
osmosis --read-xml niedersachsen.osm --bb left=7.917 right=8.1694 \
                                top=52.3537 bottom=52.3537 
                                --write-xml osnabrueck.osm
```

## osmosis in R

```{r,eval=F}
library(osmar)
?osmsource_osmosis
```

## Export to PostGIS using osmosis

[Export](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Osmosis/PostGIS_Setup)

```shell
osmosis --read-pbf erheinland-pfalz-latest.osm.pbf 
--write-pgsql database=gisdb 
```

## Back to R

- [How to make R, PostGIS and QGis cooperate](https://hal.inria.fr/file/index/docid/737397/filename/bonin_V2.pdf)

```{r,echo=F,eval=F}
setwd("")
```


```{r,eval=F,message=F,warning=F}
require(rgdal)
dsn="PG:dbname='gisdb'"
ogrListLayers(dsn)
```
